sentences.english: More diseases are thought fields, ap pension money has exiled shame.

sentences.english: You deserve this splendid success sincerest congratulations.

sentences.english: He felt guilty at deserting his clients but still he did that.
sentences.chinese: 他覺得遺棄遺棄愧，但他還是那樣做了。
